attributes.action: Give everyone in Britain the chance to smoke a joint then hold a referendum on whether to legalise it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The reason most people don't like cannabis is that they are uneducated in it's affects. I think that if everyone in Britain smoked a joint it would show them that it is in fact a very enjoyable experience and that it doesn't deserve the bad press and hysteria that we have in todays Britain.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
